name: training-science-docs
description: Scientific documentation and references for advanced running training plans

scripts.update-viewer: cd viewer && npm install && npm run build && cp dist/markdown-docs-viewer.umd.cjs ../markdown-docs-viewer.umd.cjs && cd .. && echo 'Viewer updated successfully!'
scripts.build-viewer: cd viewer && npm run build && cp dist/markdown-docs-viewer.umd.cjs ../markdown-docs-viewer.umd.cjs
